text: Haesselia roraimensis is a species of liverwort in the Cephaloziaceae family. It is endemic to Guyana. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. ==Sources== * Bryophyte Specialist Group 2000. Haesselia roraimensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Jungermanniales Category:Flora of Guyana Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Haesselia roraimensis
